description:
Boutique private complex on affluent riverside suburb. Enjoy premium living in one of Perth's most sought after Swan Riverside suburbs. There is so much to discover in vibrant Attadale.

Construction is well in progress by regarded local builder Pyramid Constructions who are based in Applecross with completion due early 2023. "The Groves" apartments are brought to you by award winning SKS Group (developer & builder of DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel, Northbridge & Elizabeth Quay) and is strategically located at the very heart of Attadale. Attadale has long been one of Perth's most desirable suburbs, being just 12kms from the Perth CBD, 8kms from Fremantle, on the banks of the river and boasting amazing homes all along the river.

Final sumptuous penthouse with 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, powder room, study, huge balcony from living room for entertainment, additional private balcony for master bedroom, sprawling over the top floor at $1,095,000 (U31 Type A South facing). This penthouse on the top floor is carefully designed and crafted with timeless elegance, reflecting the character of the building's sophisticated exterior elements. Living areas exude space and maximize perspectives with cleaver use of light, with open plan layouts providing expansive views across the evergreen Attadale landscape.

QUALITY FEATURES include but are not limited to;
- In house gym, yoga room and sky lounge
- Boutique exclusive building of only 34 apartments
- Mostly owner occupiers in this private complex
- Private security entry for penthouse units
- Built in mirrored robes plus skirting boards throughout
- Generous sized balconies for your enjoyment totalling 54m2
- Quartz stone benchtops, SMEG kitchen appliances
- Kitchen with Island Bench for added meal preparation space
- Floor to ceiling tiles in bathrooms
- Convenience of spacious 5.4m2 storeroom next to your abode
- Secured gated and undercover side by side parking plus visitors carbays
- Engineered timber floorboards to the open plan living, dining & kitchen
- So very close to Fremantle, Perth, Garden City Shopping Centre and Applecross.
- One street from the Swan River foreshore and a glorious park directly opposite.

This luxury and unbelievably priced apartment bring together amazingly opulent finishes in a highly desirable address and oozes quality yet at "prices for quality" that you won't believe!! ACT NOW before it is SOLD! Whether you are downsizing, upsizing or investing, this opportunity at The Groves, Attadale will be due to sell out swiftly. The Groves is the perfect landing place for a lifestyle change; pet friendly and we can even assist with a subject sale or rent back of your current home. Ask us now for more details.

Don't hesitate to secure this brilliant opportunity. ACT NOW to secure your new abode and have the peace of mind of NO price increase! Ask us for a list of the quality specs and finishes today and move into your new home in 2023 by calling Kong Wai 0477 333 450 or Chanel Loy on 0422 105 352.

*Please note, photos are for information only and are artist impressions. All images are conceptual only.
